committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that any worker with twenty-five years of service or more shall have a current connection for certain purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to deem an individual to have a current connection with the railroad industry after completing 25 years of service for purposes of determining annuity eligibility requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that any worker with twenty-five years of service or more shall have a current connection for certain purposes.
